Containers.Query: SELECT c.id, c.Data.Markup AS CareerProgression FROM c
SELECT c.id, c.Data.Courses.CourseKeywords AS CourseKeywords, ARRAY(SELECT VALUE t.Title FROM t IN c.Data.Apprenticeships.Standards) AS ApprenticeshipStandards FROM c
SELECT c.id, t.Subject AS UniversitySubject, t.FurtherInformation AS UniversityFurtherInformation FROM c JOIN t IN c.Data.EntryRoutes.CommonRoutes WHERE t.RouteName = 'University'
SELECT c.id, t.Subject AS CollegeSubject, t.FurtherInformation AS CollegeFurtherInformation FROM c JOIN t IN c.Data.EntryRoutes.CommonRoutes WHERE t.RouteName = 'College'
SELECT c.id, t.Subject AS ApprenticeshipSubject, t.FurtherInformation AS ApprenticeshipFurtherInformation FROM c JOIN t IN c.Data.EntryRoutes.CommonRoutes WHERE t.RouteName = 'Apprenticeship'

SELECT c.id, c.Data.EntryRouteSummary AS EntryRouteSummary, c.Data.EntryRoutes.Work AS Work, c.Data.EntryRoutes.Volunteering AS Volunteering, c.Data.EntryRoutes.DirectApplication AS DirectApplication, c.Data.EntryRoutes.OtherRoutes AS OtherRoutes, c.Data.MoreInformation.CareerTips AS CareerTips, c.Data.MoreInformation.ProfessionalAndIndustryBodies AS ProfessionalAndIndustryBodies, c.Data.MoreInformation.FurtherInformation AS FurtherInformation FROM c
SELECT c.id, c.MetaTags.Title AS Title, c.CanonicalName AS CanonicalName FROM c

SELECT c.id, c.Data.Soc.SocCode AS SocCode, c.Data.SalaryStarter AS SalaryStarter, c.Data.SalaryExperienced AS SalaryExperienced, c.Data.MinimumHours AS MinimumHours, c.Data.MaximumHours AS MaximumHours, ARRAY(SELECT VALUE t.Title FROM t IN c.Data.HiddenAlternativeTitle) as HiddenAlternativeTitles FROM c
SELECT c.id, ARRAY(SELECT VALUE t.Title FROM t IN c.Data.RelatedCareers) AS RelatedCareers FROM c
SELECT c.id, c.Data.OtherRequirements AS OtherRequirements, c.Data.DigitalSkill AS DigitalSkill FROM c
SELECT c.id, c.Data.Tasks AS Tasks FROM c
